name: LDVR's VR Explosive Kitten Toss for the Vive
name_original: LDVR's VR Explosive Kitten Toss for the Vive
description:
DO YOU LAY AWAKE AT NIGHT DREAMING HOW TOSSING EXPLODING KITTENS IN VR ON THE VIVE MIGHT BENEFIT MANKIND?

Me either.

Er wait, you do? WHOA!

Then this is the title for you!

I just was curious what it'd be like to toss exploding kittens and whether that was fun. And then I needed to test out some core ideas that I'm planning on putting in Coinvault this week. I am not putting explosive kittens into Coinvault. Nice try! :D

We're gonna make kitten throwing great again. Here's how. You throw the kittens fast enough, and hard enough, and sometimes they'll go KAPOW!

A-A-And..... next thing you know, this monstrosity was born.

  • Application Button resets.
  • Grip button grabs.
  • Your arm throws.

It's horribly awful fun. Enjoy!
